attributes.action: Cut Overseas Aid To Increase Payments at Home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS and Benifits are short of money and swamped by immigration. The government should Reduce aid overseas and limit NHS Treatment to emergancy only for non noationals for the first two years of residence in this country. Thus giving more to us the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
